Related Character(s): 㱭
Связанный символ (и): 㱭

毈字的基本解释

毈
duàn
蛋内坏散，孵不成小鸟：“兽胎不贕，鸟卵不毈。”

毈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duàn］
［《廣韻》徒玩切，去换，定。］
卵坏散，孵不成幼雏。

毈字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　毈； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页587第22
【唐韻】【集韻】?徒玩切，音段。【說文】卵不孚也。【玉篇】不成子曰毈。【淮南子·原道訓】獸胎不贕，鳥卵不毈。【高誘註】胎不成獸曰贕，卵不成鳥曰毈。【揚子·法言】雌之不才，其卵毈矣。【張華·禽經】鸛，水鳥也。伏卵時數入水，冷則不毈。　又【集韻】杜果切，音惰。義同。　或作㱭。互見歹部㱭字註。卵字原从卵从鳥。

毈字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
毈字的起名意思

暂无。

infertile egg
Basic explanation of words
infertile egg
duàn
The inside of the egg is broken, and the bird cannot be hatched: "The fetus of a beast is not small, and the egg of a bird is not awkward."
infertile egg
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duàn］
["Guangyun" only play and cut, change, set. ]
The eggs are broken and scattered, and the chicks cannot be hatched.
infertile egg
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Fanzi Department] 　毈; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 587 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Play only and cut, segments. [Said the text] The egg is not good. [Jade articles] It is not a child to say 毈. [Huainanzi·Yuan Taoxun] Animal fetuses are not cramped, and bird eggs are not awkward. [High lure note] The fetus does not become a beast, and the egg does not become a bird. 【Yangtze·Fayan】The female is not talented, and its eggs are awkward. [Zhang Hua·Qin Jing] Storks are also water birds. Count into the water when the egg is resting, but it is not too cold when it is cold.　[Jiyun] Du Guoqie, the sound is lazy. The same meaning.　或作㱭. See each other's evil side 㱭 word note. The word egg was originally from the egg from the bird.
